ygData.subject: Re: some questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hi :) The bad news first.  Gladiator doesn t currently support modem or network play; only cramming people together on one computer :( The various cheats
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 18
Message-ID: <17248.18.58.959279670@...>
Date: Sun, 28 Feb 1999 15:27:02 -0500
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: some questions

>From: SPJUNKIES@...
>
>Hi I just wanted to know what enable cheats do, and what do the red, blue, and
>green potions do, also is it possible to play gladiator against someone via
>modem?

Hi :) The bad news first.  Gladiator doesn't currently support modem or
network play; only cramming people together on one computer :(

The various cheats make your characters stronger (add hitpoints, add mana,
etc.); give them special abilities (start flying, become invisible, etc.)
and similar things. They're generally non-permanent; in other words, you
use them for a burst of power, and your character reverts to "normal" after
a time period.

--Tom
